CustomField.formula: IF( Price__c < MSP__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif","red", 20, 20)+" Part is below MSPÂ ", IF( Price__c > MSP__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "yellow", 20, 20)+" Part not below MSP ", IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "green", 20, 20)+" Part is same as MSP " ))
CustomField.label: MSP Price Warning
